replies.body:
You flamed all game and probably tilted yourself and your team off the face of the earth.

Chat restrictions are for any highly negative or game-ruining action, not just specific forms of toxicity. Dont waste your time arguing with people, it wont make them play better.
no. i didnt flame at all

i complain but didnt  flame. I even helped others out. But i talked about the troll.
I stated facts

> [{quoted}](name=legnats9292,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=R9gWAvmu,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-23T03:21:55.643+0000)
>
> i complain but didnt  flame. I even helped others out. But i talked about the troll.
> I stated facts

If I just started talking about how stupid you are, would you feel that I was being rude? Maybe I feel like I am just stating facts. There are two sides to the coin. Don't be a dick on either side and you won't get banned.
And dude. I wasnt being a dick. The only person i said anything bad about was jax. Thus there was a very toxic bot team.
Even if Jax was breaking rules, it doesn't give you the right to flame him. And you need to understand that you **were** flaming him, whether or not you understand that does not change that fact.
i said a few things once or twice,
Over half (52% to be exact) of your chat was you flaming others. These lines occurred over 19 unique instances - each of which was separated by barely neutral chat.
no they werent. It was me complaining.

Cool - let's look at you complaining.

*10 instances of giving up/trying to pressure your team to FF well before the end of the game

*No less than 18 lines that are **ONLY** insulting - and have no value whatsoever

*No less than 23 lines of you directly harassing Jax repeatedly calling for reports, calling them a troll, and threatening them with a ban

None of those things are complaining - that is all toxicity. And that's just what I found with **one** glance through your log.

WE LOST NO CHANCE. THEY WERE SO FED AND WE HAD NO TOWERS WHILE THEY WERE AT INHIBS. AD NO YOU ARE WRONG. IF U CAN PICK OUT EVERY LINE WERE I WAS TOXIC IL PROBE YOU WRONG. WE CAN EVEN GET IN DIS AND IL EXPLAIN THEM TO YOU. WELL WATCH REPLAY. AND NO WHAT YOU SAY IS BS. YOU COME UP WITH EXACTLY 52%. I GARENTEE YOU THAT IS WRONG

Please turn your caps lock off. There is no reason for you to be using it.

You do not need to explain anything. Your logs speak for themselves. The game is not over until a nexus falls - I have won multiple games **this season** with no towers left on our side (i.e. all three inhibs were down at one point and our nexus turrets fell also).

I used an excel spreadsheet where I pasted your logs - all 116 lines of them. I then went through and put a "1" next to each line that was toxic or negative - and came up with 61 lines of negativity - and I was being generous as to what *may* be considered not negative. 61/116 is 52.5862%.

Your attitude in this thread is indicative of the attitude that got you punished in that game. You are constantly trying to prove yourself right - and when things go south you turn to insulting others, screaming at them, and spamming negativity at them.
AND LIKE THE ENEMY TEAM YOUR ALSO BLIND. WHEN THE TEAM IS AHEAD WERE THEY CAN ALMOST INSTED KILL US UNDER TURRETS AND ARE AT INHIBS. ITS GG
CAUSE HALF THE SHIT DOWN THERE ISNT EVEN TOXICITY, ITS YOUR POOR EXCUSE, LIKE YOUR LIFE
SO FUCK YOU IM OUT, AND SHOVE YOU TRASH GAVE UP YOUR ASS.

> [{quoted}](name=legnats9292,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=R9gWAvmu,comment-id=00000000000000010001000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-23T03:46:25.631+0000)
>

WE CAN EVEN GET IN DIS AND IL EXPLAIN THEM TO YOU. WELL WATCH REPLAY. AND NO WHAT YOU SAY IS BS. YOU COME UP WITH EXACTLY 52%. I GARENTEE YOU THAT IS WRONG

I think i found out here. Your just an asshole who doesn't care about the players. You even enjoy being a dick. So you come up with these Bs excuses to be an asshole. Well fuck you, i quite LOL. This game is a waste of time. You made it pay to play, Almost every other game there is a toxic asshole, You have such strict rules that dont work but get the good players in trouble, All league of legends is is a joke. So fuck you and your shit game.
So tell me, i can say one thing cuase im tilted and get chat restrict, but yet he can piss me off and ruine my game and force me o finish game. Thus this happens fairly often.
Explain how riot is being fair to me, just in great detail explain this.

What's fair to you has nothing to do with anyone else. In fact, if you were the only one banned for breaking the rules, that would still be fair. You signed an agreement with riot when you downloaded the game, and every patch after, that you would not call people names. You would arrive to be possitive, and a whole host of other things. If you do not do that and you get punished it has been fair. What other people do doesn't matter. Your only responsible for your own keyboard.
I SAID ONE THING. WHILES OTHERS WERE BEING DICKS. YOU WERE MORE OF A DICK THAN I WAS. YET NOBODY WILL DO SHIT CAUSE RIOT DOESNT CARE.
R u going to explain it to me or not?

Saying bad things about people, whether it's true or not, is being a dick. I'm sorry but it is. (not really sorry) I seriously think every time someone says something that makes you upset In game, or just makes you feel a little bad about yourself. Write it down in a notebook of things to never tell people in game. 

The Golden rule is a good rule.
dude, right now you are being more toxic than i was in that game, were is ur chat restrict?

Feel free to report my post. However. I said what I said to make a point. And I don't talk the same way on the forums as I do in game. The purpose of the two is different. I am being extremely blunt because I want you to understand that what you did is not ok. I sincerely want you to learn what is and isn't so that you never get chat restricted again. 

Think about everyone else, and how they will feel about what your saying before you say it to them. Especially in games where it is not going well. Because when people have bad games they get way more sensitive to criticism.
It is ok, anger is a natural emotion and shouold not be kept inside. Thus if you weret fucking death i said again and again i was only toxic to jax, BUT I SAID ONE THING.
Even if it was only 1 thing (it wasn't, your entire chat logs contributed to a negative game environment) that is still one thing too many.
im not stupid.

That's my point. Just because you think something is true, doesn't mean it is first off, and secondly it doesn't make it nice. Maybe Jax support was simply messing around and trying to have fun and play something that had worked for him before. You stating your 'fact' is a dick thing to do.
No. He wasnt support. He waited last secnd and took jungle. Even though a reck sai took jungle 20 seconds erlier. I wasnt mean to her. I was mad at the trolling jax.

Comments like "yea f u jax" are never acceptable under any circumstance, nor are they considered "stating facts".

Next time there's a troll in game, mute them.
Yea how s that chat restrictable. I say like 3 things.

Oh dear - so even that *once* is chat restrictable. You're supposed to keep the game a positive and sportsmanlike place. Complaining about your teammate's performance both destroys that, and isn't going to make them play better anyways.
Make them play better, they were trolling and have had many accounts banned.
He right after match told me he is waiting for the penalty and he doesnt care, he will just make another account.

I'm just repeating what others have said.  You're constantly pouring on the negative attitude.  You're constantly being insulting, especially to your Jax. 

Look, man, it takes effort to be toxic.  You don't HAVE to type in chat.  At all. You HAVE to go out of your way to be toxic.  Just... don't hit that "enter" key.  Team mate does something you think is bad?  Shout, scream, curse, I don't care.  Nobody but you and whoever lives with you will hear it.  The moment that bleeds into the chat for all to see, you're just asking to be penalized.

well solo bot this fuckin thing
i wish i had a real support
thanks for ruining my game
yea f u
u troll
yea f u jax

...I assume you had a Jax support.
No, i hat a kai si support. I wasnt being mean to her. I wanted a support champion. Jax took her role.
